solution_line_template: Hanna has {hannah_multiplier} times as many dolls as her sister, so {hannah_multiplier} x {sister_dolls} dolls = <<{hannah_multiplier}*{sister_dolls}={hannah_dolls}>>{hannah_dolls} dolls.
Together, they have {sister_dolls} dolls + {hannah_dolls} dolls = <<{sister_dolls}+{hannah_dolls}={total_dolls}>>{total_dolls} dolls.
